Articles.Content:
Apparently it's on Minmus, and in three seperate locations, too. Also, you need to take its temperature once.

Anyone else got funny procedural contract names/situations?

> 
> Apparently it's on Minmus, and in three seperate locations, too. Also, you need to take its temperature once.
> Anyone else got funny procedural contract names/situations?

There's a Manley's Defeat for me on the south pole of Mun

> 
> There's a Manley's Defeat for me on the south pole of Mun

IMPOSSIBLE

And this one's funny just because of how hard it is, while they still expect me to do it:

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-07T23:04:26Z" title="05/07/2015 11:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 7, 2015</time> by parameciumkid**

...

I send her on all the mission firsts and I still haven't gotten that contract. Maybe I shouldn't be so good to her.

LOL I have not seen any of these, perform seismic surveys near site MILF. I laughed at that Eve one you posted above as well, what a ridiculous mission if I've ever seen one. If it's already brutally difficult to escape Eve. Why don't they just complicate it a little more and as you to land on a specific site near a lake bed to get the ore while they are at it?!
